stu_tags: SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  LOTS OF HOMEWORK  EXTRA CREDIT
comments: At first, I did not like Prof. Koelle at first. I thought she was grumpy all the time, but it is just her sense of humor. There is about the same amount of homework that I received in my high school math classes. She is really helpful if you go to her for help. She will spend all class going over homework if it is needed. The class is hard, though.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Participation matters (2)  Hilarious (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Tough Grader (1)
stu_tags: EXTRA CREDIT  HILARIOUS  LOTS OF HOMEWORK
comments: Professor Koelle is a really nice, involved teacher. She is funny and interesting. Her class is easy if you do the homework and pay attention. The tests can be tough and there aren\'t many but there are many ways to get extra credit.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Participation matters (2)  Hilarious (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Tough Grader (1)
stu_tags: PARTICIPATION MATTERS  LOTS OF HOMEWORK  TOUGH GRADER
comments: Worst class ever. Being someone who isn\'t awful but not great at math she isn\'t very helpful. She told me if I worked hard she would give me the grade I deserved. Did that happen, no. If you can, avoid her at all costs. Lots of homework. Doesn\'t seem to care about her students

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Participation matters (2)  Hilarious (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Tough Grader (1)
stu_tags: CLEAR GRADING CRITERIA  HILARIOUS  PARTICIPATION MATTERS
comments: Dr. Koelle is a funny lady, if you pay attention in class you will definitely notice her sense of humor! Her lectures are confusing sometimes but doing your homework will definitely help and she always answers homework questions in class. She is very helpful in her office hours and tests are totally fine if you are prepared.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Participation matters (2)  Hilarious (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Tough Grader (1)
comments: One of the best professors I have ever had. She actually made me fall in love with math even after hating it in high school. Her classes are NOT easy, but she is very helpful and very nice. I could tell she actually cared if I understood the content.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Participation matters (2)  Hilarious (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Tough Grader (1)
comments: Doesn\'t explain things thoroughly, gives ridiculous projects that have nothing to do with the material we\'re learning in class. Always makes me more confused every time we leave class. She\'s a nice woman just a horrible teacher. Tests and straightforward though and you can get a good grade if you do the homework

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Participation matters (2)  Hilarious (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Tough Grader (1)
comments: She knows what she is talking about. She thinks that it is easy, so you have to speak up if you don\'t understand. All her tests are very straight forward. She will not give anything that has not been done in class.

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Participation matters (2)  Hilarious (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Tough Grader (1)
comments: Excellent teacher! I took many classes and independent studies with Ruth while I was at RWU. She worked hard with me to make sure I understood. She is a very tough teacher and her classes are very difficult, but she\'s an excellent teacher. She knows her stuff AND knows how to teach! If you\'re a math major, you will learn alot from her!

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Participation matters (2)  Hilarious (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Tough Grader (1)
comments: Clearly a very smart woman, but I don\'t think she\'s great at verbal communications. If you need things explained in English to understand the concepts, you may have some difficultly following her. In general, she speaks in a disjoined and unpredictable way. Bottom line though? She knows her stuff, will work to make it clear if you ask often enough

tag_professor: LOTS OF HOMEWORK (3)  EXTRA CREDIT (2)  Participation matters (2)  Hilarious (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Tough Grader (1)
comments: Ruth was one of the best math professors I had. I had many independent studies with her as well as regular classes. She was tough, but an excellent teacher. One of the few who both knows her stuff AND knows how to teach it to you! She\'s very nice and will spend one-on-one time with you if you go to see her. I have many fond memories of her classes!
